alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Thunderstorm winds and potentially additional thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa County through 715 PM MST... At 629 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm winds along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Wickenburg to 6 miles northeast of Beardsley to near Peoria to near Metro Center Mall to near Piestewa Peak Park. Movement was southwest at 25 mph. Additional storm redevelopment possible. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, El Mirage, Tolleson, Wickenburg, Youngtown, Sun City West, Waddell, Cashion, Circle City, Sun City, Wittmann, Litchfield Park, Piestewa Peak Park, White Tank Mountain Park and North Mountain Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 126 and 146. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 200 and 216. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
